title: Reflexive-transitive closure as an indexed union

blocks.name: crtrcl
blocks.content: Extend class notation with recursively defined reflexive, transitive closure.

blocks.name: df-rtrclrec
blocks.content: The reflexive, transitive closure of a relation constructed as the union of all finite exponentiations. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.)

blocks.name: dfrtrclrec2
blocks.content: If two elements are connected by a reflexive, transitive closure, then they are connected via ` n ` instances the relation, for some ` n ` . (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.)

thm dfrtrclrec2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)))), wi(w0, wrel(c1)))
  mpbir(wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)))), wi(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  mpancom(w0, wb(wbr(c0, cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))))
  sylancl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))), universe))

  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))), w0, wbr(c0, cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)), wbr(c0, ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))), c2))
  breq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))), c0, c2)
  3bitr4g(w0, wbr(c0, ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))), c2), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cn0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))))
  a1i(w0, wb(wcel(cop(c0, c2), ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cn0, wcel(cop(c0, c2), co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))))))
  eliun(s0, cop(c0, c2), cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0)))
  df-br(c0, ciun(s0, cn0, co(c1, crelexp, cv(s0))), c2)

  breqd(c0, cfv(crtrcl, c1), c2, cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1), wceq(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0))))))
  fveq1(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(s0, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(s0)))), c1)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0[(c1[^r]s0)]c2)))

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0[(t*rec ` c1)]c2 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0[(c1[^r]s0)]c2))), (w0 ‚Üí Rel(c1)))

  sylancl(w0, ((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0)))` c1)= ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0)), c1 ‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0))‚àà ùïå)
  iunex(s0, cn0, (c1[^r]s0))

  ovex(c1, crelexp, s0)
  fvmptg(hs0, c1, universe, ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0)), universe, (hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0))), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0)))

  eqid((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0))))
  sylan9bb(((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0)))` c1)= ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0)), w0, c0[((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0)))` c1)]c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0[(c1[^r]s0)]c2), c0[‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0))]c2)
  breq(((hs0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(hs0[^r]s0)))` c1), ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0)), c0, c2)
  3bitr4g(w0, c0[‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0))]c2, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c0[(c1[^r]s0)]c2), < c0, c2 > ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà(c1[^r]s0)))
  a1i(w0, (< c0, c2 > ‚àà ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0,(c1[^r]s0))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, < c0, c2 > ‚àà(c1[^r]s0))))

blocks.name: rtrclreclem1
blocks.content: The reflexive, transitive closure is indeed reflexive. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rtrclreclem1(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(crtrcl, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wrel(c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
} = {
  mpbir(wi(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(crtrcl, c0))), wi(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0))))
  sseqtr4d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0), ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))), wrex(hs1, cn0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))))
  sylancr(w0, wrex(hs1, cn0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))), wcel(nat0, cn0), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, nat0)))
  0nn0()
  syl5sseqr(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, nat0), cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), w0)
  ssid(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))))
  relexp0d(c0, w0)
  rspcev(hs1, nat0, cn0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, nat0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))))
  sseq2d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)), co(c0, crelexp, nat0), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), nat0, c0, crelexp)
  ssiun(hs1, cn0, cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))
  sylancl(w0, wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0), ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))), universe))
  iunex(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)))
  nn0ex()
  ovex(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))
  fvmptg(hs0, c0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))), universe, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1))))
  iuneq2d(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)), co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))))
  ax-mp(wb(wi(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(crtrcl, c0))), wi(w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0)))), wceq(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1))))))
  df-rtrclrec(hs0, hs1)
  imbi2d(wceq(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1))))), w0, wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(crtrcl, c0)), wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0)))
  sseq2d(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), cfv(crtrcl, c0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0), wceq(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1))))))
  fveq1(crtrcl, cmpt(hs0, universe, ciun(hs1, cn0, co(cv(hs0), crelexp, cv(hs1)))), c0)
  diff.hs1.c(nat0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn0)
  diff.hs1.w(wss(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))), co(c0, crelexp, nat0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cres(cid, cuni(cuni(c0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(hs1, cn0, co(c0, crelexp, cv(hs1))))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
}

blocks.name: rtrclreclem4
blocks.content: The reflexive, transitive closure of ` R ` is the smallest reflexive, transitive relation which contains ` R ` and the identity. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.content: The two definitions ` t* ` and ` t*rec ` of the reflexive, transitive closure coincide if ` R ` is indeed a relation. (Contributed by Drahflow, 12-Nov-2015.) (Revised by RP, 30-May-2020.)
